The 'Hollow' is a fictional entity created by Brad Kern for the American
television series, [[Charmed]]. It first appears in the fourth season of the
supernatural drama and is used again in the last two episodes of the series in
its eighth season. It is an essence that can possess any living being, and when
it is allowed to take on a corporeal form, it was portrayed by Peter Woodward,
Julian McMahon, Holly Marie Combs, Alyssa Milano, Rose McGowan, Kaley Cuoco,
Marnette Patterson, Lawrence Smilgys, and Robert Madrid.
